message: Let's get this started! I'm willing to give you a generous share to get the negotiations going.
You were too generous in round 1, I'm expecting a fairer share now
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more for my efforts.
You're still not offering me enough. I'm starting to think you're not serious about negotiating
I'm not afraid to walk away, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. Take it or leave it.
I'm starting to think you're trying to lowball me. I'm not going to accept a worse deal than the last one
I'm not budging. Take this deal or I'll walk away with the majority of the cash.
